short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows off a notification when you get a new sale on an envato marketplace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple, yet powerful extensions for displaying a desktop notification when you get a new sale on any Envato Marketplace.
